name: Lift Your Business
tagline: Los Angeles Small Business Marketing Consultant
description:
LYB helps small business owners grow their revenues and understand how to do it on their own.
We offer free content including:
- The Ultimate Strategic Marketing Guide
- YouTube Video series: Escape 5 Revenue Draining Blackholes and Win Ideal Clients
- Small Business Marketing System Tools & Resource Guide 
Our signature program, “Marketing Department in a Box”, includes education, strategy, content production and implementation.
